DOC.brief_summary: This study multi-site , 5-visit dispensing , bilateral double-arm parallel group design , double-masked clinical trial use investigational contact lens market contact lens . The objective evaluate comfort contact lenses worn daily wear modality .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Approved Investigational Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must 18 40 year age time consent . The subject 's vertexed spherical equivalent distance refraction must range +8.00 12.00 eye . Subject wear habitual contact lenses minimum 4 day per week , eight hour per day . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/30 good eye . The subject must habitual frequent replacement daily wear spherical silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer eye . The subject must able wear contact lenses minimum 8 hour day study . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . Any known sensitive/allergic Ingredients OPTIFREE® PureMoist® solution . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia , moderate corneal distortion . Any previous , plan , ocular interocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc. ) . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) FDA classification scale , previous history sign contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event ( e.g. , past peripheral ulcer round peripheral scar ) , ocular abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 7 day prior study enrollment .
